subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Oliver Pérez put his World Baseball Classic performance behind him in his return to his major league team, pitching three shutout innings in the Mets’ 4-0 victory over the Orioles.
snippet: Oliver Pérez put his World Baseball Classic performance behind him in his return to his major league team, pitching three shutout innings in the Mets’ 4-0 victory over the Orioles.
